properties.title: Petting zoo and playground at Foundation Alpenruhe in Saanen, Switzerland
properties.abstract: Are you and your children looking for a variety of interesting activities in the Saanenland? Visit the Foundation Alpenruhe and enjoy the big playground and petting zoo!
properties.description:
Situated in the Saanenland, the Foundation Alpenruhe offers a varied program for families. Visit the big playground with the Pirate's ship, jumping cushion, giant ball track and many more attractions. Pet the rabbits, goats, sheep and let the lamas, alpacas, ponies and other animals amaze you.

In summer, weather permitting, (usually on Wednesday afternoons) the kids can take the children's train or ride ponies. The Alpenruhe Cafeteria is located next to the playground: relax on the covered terrace and refresh yourself with a drink and a snack. A shop with interesting and varied products of Alpenruhe Foundation is also located in the cafeteria.
